      • retrievePodcastFolderId

        public String retrievePodcastFolderId(String siteId)
                               throws PermissionException
        Returns podcast folder id using either 'podcasts' or 'Podcasts'. If it does not exist in either form, will create it.
        Specified by:
        retrievePodcastFolderId in interface PodcastService
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site to search
        Returns:
        String Contains the complete id for the podcast folder
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Access denied or Not found so not available
        IdInvalidException - Constructed Id not valid
        IdUsedException - When attempting to create Podcast folder, id is a duplicate

      • addPodcast

        public void addPodcast(String title,
              Date displayDate,
              String description,
              byte[] body,
              String filename,
              String contentType)
                throws OverQuotaException,
                       ServerOverloadException,
                       InconsistentException,
                       IdInvalidException,
                       IdLengthException,
                       PermissionException,
                       IdUniquenessException
        Add a podcast to the site's resources
        Specified by:
        addPodcast in interface PodcastService
        Parameters:
        title - The title of this podcast resource
        displayDate - The display date for this podcast resource
        description - The description of this podcast resource
        body - The bytes of this podcast
        filename - The filename of the podcast being saved
        Throws:
        OverQuotaException - To display Over Quota Alert to user
        ServerOverloadException - To display Internal Server Error Alert to user
        InconsistentException - To display Internal Server Error Alert to user
        IdInvalidException - To display Invalid Id Alert to user
        IdLengthException - To display File path too long Alert to user
        PermissionException - To display Permission denied Alert to user
        IdUniquenessException - To display Duplicate id used Alert to user

      • checkDISPLAY_DATE

        public List checkDISPLAY_DATE(List resourcesList)
        Checks if podcast resources have a DISPLAY_DATE set. Occurs when files uploaded to podcast folder from Resources.
        Specified by:
        checkDISPLAY_DATE in interface PodcastService
        Parameters:
        List - The list of podcast resources
        Returns:
        List The list of podcast resource all with DISPLAY_DATE property

      • checkDISPLAY_DATE

        public List checkDISPLAY_DATE(List resourcesList,
                     String siteId)

      • setDISPLAY_DATE

        public ContentResource setDISPLAY_DATE(String resourceId,
                              Time releaseDate)
        Sets the DISPLAY_DATE property to the creation date of the podcast. Needed if file added using Resources. Time stored is GMT so when pulled need to convert to local.
        Parameters:
        ResourceProperties - The ResourceProperties that need DISPLAY_DATE added

      • setDISPLAY_DATE

        public ContentResource setDISPLAY_DATE(String siteId,
                              String resourceId,
                              Time releaseDate)

      • getDISPLAY_DATE

        public Time getDISPLAY_DATE(ResourceProperties rp)
        If Release Date property not set, check if DISPLAY_DATE exists and if it does, return it so it can be set as the Release Date. If DISPLAY_DATE does not exist, default to last modified date.
        Parameters:
        ResourceProperties - The ResourceProperties to get DISPLAY_DATE from

      • isPodcastFolderHidden

        public boolean isPodcastFolderHidden(String siteId)
                              throws IdUnusedException,
                                     PermissionException
        Returns TRUE if Podcasts folder has HIDDEN property set OR release date is in the future OR retract date is in the past 05/08 - enable security advisor since if folder is truly hidden and a student/access user attempts to access it will generate a Permissions error
        Specified by:
        isPodcastFolderHidden in interface PodcastService
        Parameters:
        siteId - The site id to check
        Throws:
        IdUnusedException
        PermissionException

      • allowAccess

        public boolean allowAccess(String id)
        Determines if authenticated user has 'read' access to podcast collection folder
        Specified by:
        allowAccess in interface PodcastService
        Parameters:
        id - The id for the podcast collection folder
        Returns:
        TRUE - has read access, FALSE - does not

      • enablePodcastSecurityAdvisor

        protected void enablePodcastSecurityAdvisor()
        Establish a security advisor to allow the "embedded" azg work to occur with no need for additional security permissions. Kept here since don't want to make public.
